ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !$User.Ignorar_erros__c, NOT( OR( LEN(CPF__pc)=0,AND(MOD(MOD(11-MOD( VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,1,1))*10+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,2,1))*9+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,3,1))*8+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,5,1))*7+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,6,1))*6+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,7,1))*5+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,9,1))*4+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,10,1))*3+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,11,1))*2,11),11),10)= VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,13,1)),MOD(MOD(11-MOD( VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,1,1))*11+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,2,1))*10+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,3,1))*9+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,5,1))*8+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,6,1))*7+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,7,1))*6+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,9,1))*5+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,10,1))*4+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,11,1))*3+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,13,1))*2,11),11),10)= VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,14,1))))) && NOT(OR(LEN(CPF__pc)=0,AND(MOD(MOD(11-MOD( VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,1,1))*10+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,2,1))*9+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,3,1))*8+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,4,1))*7+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,5,1))*6+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,6,1))*5+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,7,1))*4+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,8,1))*3+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,9,1))*2,11),11),10)= VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,10,1)),MOD(MOD(11-MOD( VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,1,1))*11+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,2,1))*10+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,3,1))*9+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,4,1))*8+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,5,1))*7+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,6,1))*6+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,7,1))*5+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,8,1))*4+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,9,1))*3+ VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,10,1))*2,11),11),10)= VALUE(MID(CPF__pc,11,1))))))
